sentences.english: I hope this shipment is of the same quality.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這船貨能有同樣的質量。

sentences.english: Parcel out a shipment to several buyers .
sentences.chinese: 把一批船貨分發給幾家買主。

sentences.english: We find that the quality of your shipment is not in conformity with the agreed specifications.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現你方船貨的質量與我們同意的規格不符。

sentences.english: Insurance company insured ships and their cargoes against loss and sea.
sentences.chinese: 保險公司爲船舶和船貨承保了海損險。

sentences.english: Mr. Tao, I'd like to talk the insurance covering the consignment with you.
sentences.chinese: 陶先生，我想與你談談這批船貨的保險問題。

sentences.english: They scuttled the deck when the ship caught the fire.
sentences.chinese: 當貨船失火時，他們鑿開甲板以搶救船貨。

sentences.english: Fundamental elements and issues shaping traveler and freight transportation systems.
sentences.chinese: 基本元素和問題形成旅客和船貨運輸系統。

sentences.english: The ship will unlade her cargo today.
sentences.chinese: 這艘船今天將卸下它的船貨。
